text: Douglas William Hodge (born 25 February 1960) is an English actor, director, and musician. He won a Tony Award, a Drama Desk Award and a Laurence Olivier Award. Hodge appeared in Robin Hood (2010), Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return and Diana (2013), Penny Dreadful (2016), Catastrophe (2018), Joker and Lost in Space (2019), and The Great (2020â€“2023). Hodge was born in Plymouth, Devon. Until 2013 he was in a relationship with actress Tessa Peake-Jones.
